game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity has been wiped out by an unknown catastrophic event.
game.ending: The last remnants of humanity have found hope in a hidden underground bunker. The player must find a way to restore the planet's ecosystem.
game.synopsis: "Echoes of Eternity" is a narrative-driven RPG set in a dystopian future. Players navigate the ruins of civilization, uncovering clues and piecing together events leading up to the apocalypse. Along the way, they encounter other survivors, form alliances, and make choices impacting humanity's last hope.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
